name: Arena Stars (itch)
description:
Be the star of battle arena among the stars! Find and shoot your opponent!

Players can activate stage hazards of their own color to lure the other player to deadly traps! Activating a trap has an inconvenient side effect on the user, thus victory is never guaranteed!

To use traps in the game you need to collect power ups. On the bottom of the screen you see how many times you can activate a trap, and you can choose a trap by pressing a button corresponding to the item card on the bottom right!

Green ship controls:
Accelerate: [W] Hold for smooth turning, press short for quick maneuvers!
Break: [S] Use this button to stop your ship.
Rotate: [A][D]
Shoot: [__space__]
Item card 1: [0]
Item card 2: [1]
Item card 3: [2]

Blue ship controls:
Accelerate: [^] Hold for smooth turning, press short for quick maneuvers!
Break: [v] Use the down button to stop your ship.
Rotate: [<][>]
                 [     ]
Shoot: [return]
Item card 1: [7]
Item card 2: [8]
Item card 3: [9]

This game has been made for Gameplicit Game Jam in 50 hours.

This game contains extra challanges:
Press F to pay respects, Wasted

Third party assets:
Kenney Asset Pack, Free sound effects from freesound and soundbible, third party fonts Anurati and LCDNova.
